title: Of Shadows
description: Ace O'Laughlin is recovering gradually from the heartbreak of his father's death following contracting a lethal disease. Now Ace must join an initiative that will see to medically treating his family, and most importantly, his kid brother Severin who has now contracted the same disease. Ace must become ruthless to stay alive and save his brother - but what happens when his heart is claimed and what will he choose when he has to make an unthinkable sacrifice? And what will happen aboard the Clarity Star ship that will change his views of power forever?Of Shadows is the first in the Clarity duology, set for release in 2015.
author: M.S. Watson
